# Test Command

This is a test command for validating OpenCode support in PromptyDumpty.

## Usage

Run this command to verify installation works correctly.

## Features

- Tests command artifact installation
- Validates frontmatter parsing
- Ensures proper path mapping to `.opencode/command/` directory
